#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int n,i,num[111],setno=1;
    while(1)
    {
    cin>>n;
    if(n>=1)
    {
    int ans=0,sum=0,avg;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        cin>>num[i];
        sum+=num[i];
    }
    avg=sum/n;
    sort(num,num+n);
    for(i=0;num[i]<avg;i++)
    ans+=(avg-num[i]);
        //printf("%d %d ",i,l);
        //cout<<ans<<endl;
    printf("Set #%d\n",setno);
    printf("The minimum number of moves is %d.\n",ans);
    ans=sum=0;
    }
    else if(n==1)
    {
    printf("Set #%d\n",setno);
    printf("The minimum number of moves is %d.\n",0);
    }
    else
    break;
    setno++;
    }
}
